column4: I've had all sorts of trouble. Like, I learned the hard way that you can't have "USB Mouse Support" on in your CMOS because it's incompatible with Ubuntu.
otherwise I couldn't get Ubuntu or Ubuntu Studio to install.
it would give me a "could not initialize i8046" error.
the problem is my audio is completely blasted (heavily distorted and low) and I can't set my screen resolution past 1024x768
I don't need to know what it says, just if the command executed correctly.
